name: Climb It
description:
Climb It is a platformer and a puzzle game. In Climb It you play as a bouncing ball. Your goal is to advance in a world divided in multiple areas. Each area is inspired by an old arcade game and contains levels to find.GAMEPLAY
  • Exploration
Advance in a 2D world full of obstacles. Be skilful and go from area to area. Find all hidden levels in the world.
  • Levels
Once you are in a level you have to collect all bricks without dying to finish the level. Use your brain and get those bricks by all means !

CHALLENGE

If you like a challenge this game is made for you. The sadistic level design will complicate things (No refund for broken mouses). But don’t worry, with enought motivation and focus you will succeed !
